titleStmt.title: A new enterlude called Thersytes thys enterlude folowynge dothe declare howe that the greatest boesters are not the greatest doers. The names of the players Thersites a boster. Mulciber a smyth. Mater a mother. Miles a knyght. Telemachus a childe.
Thersites.
titleStmt.author: Ravisius Textor, Joannes, ca. 1480-1524.
Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Tysdale and are to be solde at hys shop in the vpper ende of Lombard strete, in Alhallowes churche yarde neare vntoo grace church,

notesStmt.note: An adaptation, possibly by Nicholas Udall, of a dialogue of Joannes Ravisius Textor.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: hys shop in the vpper ende of Lombard strete, in Alhallowes churche yarde neare vntoo grace church
